area: Mull of Galloway to Mull of Kintyre including the Firth of Clyde and North Channel (14)

forecast.wind: Southerly 3 to 5 veering northwesterly 4 or 5, occasionally 6 in North Channel, becoming variable 2 to 4 later.
forecast.sea: Smooth or slight in far north, otherwise mainly slight or moderate, but becoming rough for a time near the Mull of Kintyre.
forecast.weather: Rain then showers, becoming fair later.
